'''Daya''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] who appeared in the Event [[A Parade of Providence]]. She can be found near the southern entrance of [[Sumeru City]].

During this period, Daya can be found under [[File:Icon Project Connectivity.png|30x30px]] icon on the map.

==Event Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Before completing [[Opening Festivities]])
:'''Daya:''' I do hope everyone will enjoy the game...
----
;(After completing [[Project Connectivity]])
:'''Daya:''' How about it? Care for a game of "Project Connectivity"?
:{{DIcon|Project Connectivity}} I'll give it a go.
::'''Daya:''' Alright. In that case, if you'll look over this way...
:{{DIcon}} I've got some other things to do.
::'''Daya:''' Ah, is that so... It's alright. Our booth will be open for the entire duration of the Gala.
::'''Daya:''' Whenever you feel like having a go, you can just come to me.
{{Dialogue End}}
